node.title: Blackcaps pair Williamson, Jamieson named in ICC's test team of 2021
node.description: However, no Blackcaps were named in the T20 team of the year, despite New Zealand's stellar World Cup run.
node.content: ["Blackcaps captain Kane Williamson and fast bowler Kyle Jamieson's outstanding 2021 campaigns have been recognised, with both named in the ICC's test team of the year.", "After both Williamson and Jamieson were shortlisted for the ICC's cricketer of the year, and test cricketer of the year respectively, the pair were logical selections for the test team of 2021, both enjoying a stellar 12 months, and helping New Zealand win the inaugural World Test Championship title.", "With the bat, 31-year-old Williamson averaged 65.83 from his four tests played, scoring 395 runs. However, the bulk of Williamson's runs came in his first test of the year, where he scored 238 against Pakistan in Christchurch.", "Williamson has also been named as the side's captain, ahead of both England and Sri Lankan captains Joe Root and Dimuth Karunaratne who also feature.", "Meanwhile, 26-year-old Jamieson also enjoyed a fantastic 2021 in cricket's longest format, taking 27 wickets at an average of 17.51, and was man-of-the-match in the World Test Championship final in June.", "Jamieson's incredible form with the ball also saw him become the fastest New Zealander to reach the mark of 50 test wickets, doing so by bowling India's Shubman Gill in just his ninth test match since his debut at the start of 2020.\n", "Along with the two Kiwis, the team of 2021 features three Indians in Rohit Sharma, Ravichandran Ashwin and wicketkeeper Rishabh Pant, three from Pakistan in Fawad Alam, Hasan Ali and Shaheen Afridi.", "Australia, England and Sri Lanka all contribute one player each, in Marnus Labuschagne, Joe Root and Dimuth Karunaratne.", "However, despite New Zealand's run to the Twenty20 World Cup final in the UAE, not a single Blackcap has been named in the T20 team of the year.", "Similarly, with the Blackcaps only playing three one day internationals in 2021, no New Zealanders were named in the ODI team of the year either.", "ICC test team of 2021: Dimuth Karunaratne (Sri Lanka), Rohit Sharma (India), Marnus Labuschagne (Australia), Joe Root (England), Kane Williamson (New Zealand), Fawad Alam (Pakistan), Rishabh Pant (India), Ravichandran Ashwin (India), Kyle Jamieson (New Zealand), Hasan Ali (Pakistan), Shaheen Afridi (Pakistan)", "\u00a0"]
